Statute.Title: Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord Canada — Nouvelle-Écosse sur les hydrocarbures extracôtiers, Loi de mise en oeuvre de l’)

General.Text: General, 2024, c. 20, s. 183 (heading of Division II of Part III)

Transitional.Text: Transitional, 1988, c. 28 see ss. 130 to 137, 210 and 253
Transitional, 2014, c. 13, ss. 92 (s. 92(5) as amended by 2018, c. 27, s. 180) and 93

CIF.Text: CIF, 1988, c. 28 except Division VIII of Part II proclaimed in force 22.12.89 see SI/90‑9; Division VIII of Part II proclaimed in force 01.10.90 see SI/90‑152; (ss. 267(2) states that s. 216 and Part IX are applicable to taxation years commencing after a day to be fixed by proclamation)
CIF, 1990, c. 41 in force 09.11.90 see SI/90‑169
CIF, 1991, c. 46 in force 01.06.92 see SI/92‑90
CIF, 1991, c. 49, ss. 238(1) deemed in force 21.07.88 see ss. 238(2)
CIF, 1991, c. 50, ss. 25 and 26 in force 15.09.92 see SI/92‑151
CIF, 1992, c. 1, s. 144 (Sch. VII, item 7)(F) in force on assent 28.02.92
CIF, 1993, c. 47, ss. 11 to 17 in force 30.06.93 see SI/93‑149; s. 18 in force on assent 23.06.93
CIF, 1994, c. 24, s. 34(2)(F) in force on assent 23.06.94
CIF, 1994, c. 26, ss. 16(F) and 17(F) in force on assent 23.06.94
CIF, 1998, c. 15, s. 18 in force on assent 11.06.98
CIF, 1999, c. 31, ss. 30 to 35 in force on assent 17.06.99
CIF, 2001, c. 26, s. 324 in force on assent 01.11.2001; s. 281 in force 01.07.2007 see SI/2007-65
CIF, 2007, c. 33, s. 16 in force on assent 14.12.2007
CIF, 2009, c. 31, ss. 47 to 50 in force on assent 15.12.2009
CIF, 2013, c. 34, s. 369(3) in force on assent 26.06.2013; s. 369(1) and (2) deemed to have come into force 01.04.97 see s. 369(3)
CIF, 2015, c. 4, ss. 117 and 118 in force on assent 26.02.2015; [Note: ss. 117 and 118 are in force but will produce their effects only at the coming into force of the provision]

Item.Text: — ss. 88(2) and 94(2) to (4) in force 26.02.2020 or on any earlier day or days that may be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 119(2).

CIF.Text: CIF, 2017, c. 20, s. 454 in force on assent 22.06.2017
CIF, 2018, c. 27, s. 180 in force on assent 13.12.2018
CIF, 2021, c. 10, ss. 2 and 3 in force on assent 03.06.2021
CIF, SOR/2022-107 comes in force 30.07.2022 see s. 2
CIF, 2024, c. 20 in force on assent 03.10.2024, except,
CIF, 2024, c. 30, ss. 10 and 11 in force on assent 27.11.2024, except,

Item.Text: — s. 38 in force on assent 27.11.2024 (Coordinating amendment - condition deemed never to have met its effects)
